member.name: T:System.Reactive.IEventPatternSource`2
member.summary: Represents a data stream signaling its elements by means of an event.

member.name: E:System.Reactive.IEventPatternSource`2.OnNext
member.summary: Event signaling the next element in the data stream.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions
member.summary: Provides conversions from WinRT IAsyncInfo types to IObservable.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction)
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncAction to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``1(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncActionWithProgress{``0})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncActionWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``1(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncActionWithProgress{``0},System.IProgress{``0})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncActionWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. Progress information is passed out through the progress parameter.
member.param: Progress object to receive progress notifications on.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``1(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncActionWithProgress{``0},System.IObservable{``0}@)
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncActionWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. Progress information is passed out through a progress observable sequence.
member.param: Progress sequence to subscribe for progress notifications.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.
member.remarks: The asynchronous operation is only started by subscribing to the result sequence, not by subscribing to the resulting progress sequence. The progress sequence will not observe errors, but will be notified about completion of the asynchronous operation. Errors are reported through the result sequence.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservableProgress``1(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncActionWithProgress{``0})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncActionWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting progress observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its progress.
member.remarks: The resulting progress sequence is used to report errors and completion.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``1(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation{``0})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperation to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The single result of the asynchronous operation is retrieved when the operation has finished.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The single result of the asynchronous operation is retrieved when the operation has finished.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1},System.IProgress{``1})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The single result of the asynchronous operation is retrieved when the operation has finished. Progress information is passed out through the progress parameter.
member.param: Progress object to receive progress notifications on.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservable``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1},System.IObservable{``1}@)
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The single result of the asynchronous operation is retrieved when the operation has finished. Progress information is passed out through a progress observable sequence.
member.param: Progress sequence to subscribe for progress notifications.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.
member.remarks: The asynchronous operation is only started by subscribing to the result sequence, not by subscribing to the resulting progress sequence. The progress sequence will not observe errors, but will be notified about completion of the asynchronous operation. Errors are reported through the result sequence.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservableProgress``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting progress observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its progress.
member.remarks: The resulting progress sequence is used to report errors and completion.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservableMultiple``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The results of the asynchronous operation are retrieved whenever progress is reported and when the operation has finished.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservableMultiple``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1},System.IProgress{``1})
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The results of the asynchronous operation are retrieved whenever progress is reported and when the operation has finished. Progress information is passed out through the progress parameter.
member.param: Progress object to receive progress notifications on.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Windows.Foundation.AsyncInfoExtensions.ToObservableMultiple``2(Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperationWithProgress{``0,``1},System.IObservable{``1}@)
member.summary: Converts the IAsyncOperationWithProgress to a cold observable sequence. Subscribing to the resulting observable sequence triggers execution of the underlying asynchronous operation. The results of the asynchronous operation are retrieved whenever progress is reported and when the operation has finished. Progress information is passed out through a progress observable sequence.
member.param: Progress sequence to subscribe for progress notifications.
member.returns: Observable sequence used to start the asynchronous operation and retrieve its results.
member.remarks: The asynchronous operation is only started by subscribing to the result sequence, not by subscribing to the resulting progress sequence. The progress sequence will not observe errors, but will be notified about completion of the asynchronous operation. Errors are reported through the result sequence.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.AsyncInfoObservable
member.summary: Provides a set of extension methods to expose observable sequences as WinRT IAsyncInfo objects.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.AsyncInfoObservable.ToAsyncOperation``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Exposes the last element of the observable sequence through an IAsyncOperation object.
member.returns: Asynchronous operation object that exposes the results of the observable sequence.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.AsyncInfoObservable.ToAsyncOperationWithProgress``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Exposes the last element of the observable sequence through an IAsyncOperationWithProgress object, reporting incremental progress for each intermediate value produced by the sequence.
member.returns: Asynchronous operation object that exposes the results of the observable sequence.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.AsyncInfoObservable.ToAsyncOperationWithProgress``2(System.IObservable{``0},System.Func{System.IObservable{``0},System.IObservable{``1}})
member.summary: Exposes the last element of the observable sequence through an IAsyncOperationWithProgress object, using a selector function to map the source sequence on a progress reporting sequence.
member.param: Selector function to map the source sequence on a progress reporting sequence.
member.returns: Asynchronous operation object that exposes the results of the observable sequence.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.WindowsObservable
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for importing typed events from Windows Runtime APIs.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.WindowsObservable.FromEventPattern``2(System.Action{Windows.Foundation.TypedEventHandler{``0,``1}},System.Action{Windows.Foundation.TypedEventHandler{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Converts a typed event, conforming to the standard event pattern, to an observable sequence.
member.param: Action that attaches the given event handler to the underlying .NET event.
Action that detaches the given event handler from the underlying .NET event.
member.returns: The observable sequence that contains data representations of invocations of the underlying typed event.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.WindowsObservable.FromEventPattern``3(System.Func{Windows.Foundation.TypedEventHandler{``1,``2},``0},System.Action{``0},System.Action{``0})
member.summary: Converts a typed event, conforming to the standard event pattern, to an observable sequence.
member.param: A function used to convert the given event handler to a delegate compatible with the underlying typed event. The resulting delegate is used in calls to the addHandler and removeHandler action parameters.
Action that attaches the given event handler to the underlying .NET event.
Action that detaches the given event handler from the underlying .NET event.
member.returns: The observable sequence that contains data representations of invocations of the underlying typed event.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.WindowsObservable.ToEventPattern``2(System.IObservable{System.Reactive.EventPattern{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Exposes an observable sequence as an object with a typed event.
